title: Contrast checker
creator: Contrast checker
description: Checks for compliance with the contrast levels, brightness and shine in the color combination of foreground and background of textual content based on the requirements of WCAG 1 and WCAG 2.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
